alert.note: Alert for Stutsman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 20 at 8:55PM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 6 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Stutsman County. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dangerous wind chills could return Tuesday night, and likely remain through the end of the week.
info.instruction: Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
